title: Helpful and positive practice
body:
I'm reviewing the vaccination experience, but great GP and general support.
Very well organised, friendly and firm, well informed and good communication. Thanks to the lovely volunteers as well!

title: Great GP
body: I had a telephone consultation with a GP and he was very helpful and caring. I felt he really listened to my concerns and I didnâ€™t feel rushed on the call at all.

title: Great practice
body: I had an appointment today, on arrival the receptionist was very helpful and informative,the nurse which I saw was very professional and approachable,made me feel at ease.i am not a patient at this surgery,but on my experience on today's visit I would definitely recommend  eastmoor medical centre

title: Great Covid experience
body: Very friendly staff and volunteers. As a person who hates injections and is very nervous, I found the experience of having my Covid jab a dream.  I didn't even realise it had been done.  Thanks to everyone.

title: Excellent care
body:
I attended the Endoscopy dept at Newark for a colonoscopy. The care and professionalism of all the staff was exemplary. I was made to feel very comfortable and reassured. The Nurse Endoscopist was very gentle and she was very considerate to how I was feeling.
Excellent team

readBy.name: Sherwood Forest Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust

title: Care and commitment
body:
Today I visited my surgery for my Covid Vaccination and from the moment I received my text from leaving the surgery it was absolutely fantastic.
I was so worried about having my vaccination but as soon as we arrived from the smiling staff in the car park to the moment I walked into my local friendly surgery it was lovely, the receptionist who I have known for many years recognised me straight away even with my mask on and said "hello, how are you?", that put me at ease straight away, she then calmed me down and actually took me to the room where I had my vaccination and reassuringly told me " you have the best one here, to give you it", it really was nothing to worry about and the doctor and nurse were great, I felt absolutely nothing. It was so well organised, I can not thank them all enough. Thank you to all the volunteers and the Whitley House Surgery.

title: Care and communication
body: My father was very poorly in Lamport Ward. I'm not next of kin and didn't get much Doctor information via his next of kin. I live in Somerset. Staff in the ward were constrained in what they could tell me but I appreciate the information that they did give me and their obvious sympathy, care and interest. Also appreciated that they allowed me to visit on one occasion and made me feel welcome when I arrived. Also appreciated the video set up so I could see my father.

readBy.name: Kettering General Hospital NHS Foundation Trust

title: Excellent Practice
body: I am very pleased to be register in this practice. Joined in 2016 and I am very impressed. Reception staff very polite and helpful. Doctor most helpful and did not rush the appointment. Answer the phone quickly. Appointments very quick with a number of doctors to choose from. 100% better than my previous practice.  I would recommend to anyone. Excellent doctors and staff and very responsive and polite.

title: Stunning speed and efficiency with theâ€¦
body: I was absolutely staggered with how quickly and efficiently Hedena Health Care dealt with the vaccination process. Having escorted 2 other family members at other practices in the country, I went armed with my planner and a book, ready to conquer the world whilst I waited. Alas! All my plans were wasted! I didn't even have time to count how many medics and volunteers were serving us so faithfully and so efficiently. It was simply stunning! Kudos to all of you! Thank you so, so much!

title: Excellent Practice
body: I am very pleased and impressed with the doctors and the staff of this surgery. Staff is very polite and helpful and Doctors are very professional and compassionate. Normally emergency appointment are easy to make and staff on telephone is very responsive. I do recommend this practice to everyone.

title: Incredible Nurse Appointment
body: My initial interaction with the practice today was not positive however this was quickly turned around during my appointment with Nurse. I was very anxious about my appointment as my previous experiences have not been pleasant. However, Nurseâ€™s calm, gentle and professional approach has completely changed my perspective. Not only was she very reassuring and knowledgeable, she also agreed to see me as an additional patient, despite already having a fully booked and busy day. Thank you! I would also like to thank the reception manager who promptly rectified the error made by reception staff today and arranged for me to be seen. Thank you

title: They Look After You
body: Everyone there is dedicated, polite, patient, and helpful. They listen to what you have to say and don't just fob you off with a prescription to get you out of the surgery.

title: Took very good care of me
body:
I have had many experiences with UCLH over the last year or so, and I can truthfully say that all of them have been positive. They have done so much for me and have always had a great attitude. 

Highly recommend this hospital. 
Thank you so much for everything!

title: The nurse was amazing
body: I went for a smear test today and the nurse was brilliant she was so happy and friendly and really put me at ease great service thank you

title: Very Well Organised
body: I had my Covid vaccination this afternoon. I would just like to say a big thank you to everyone who was involved in organising the process. It was very well organised and made me feel proud to be British.

title: Lovely surroundings and great care
body: My mother stayed at Ramsey manor for a short time. Was well looked after, loved the staff, lovely sized bedroom and en-suite. Lovely view out of windows and horses surrounded the manor. My mother didnâ€™t want to leave.

title: Couldnâ€™t have asked for better
body: I had my first surgery today and Iâ€™ve always been scared of surgery. The orthopaedic I saw, the nurses on the day care unit, the surgeons and the Anaesthetists were the most friendliest, calming and reassuring people. I was treat with great care, constant assurance from all and complete understand that I was scared. The surgeon let me squeeze his hand until I fell to sleep and spoke so I wasnâ€™t thinking about what was happening. Iâ€™m so happy and so so thankful to everyone who was involved and made me feel as good as I did. Amazing work and the most amazing people :)

readBy.name: James Paget University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust

title: 1st Class Experience
body: Our family is grateful for how one exceptional mid-level anaesthesiologist handled two closely related cases in our family unknown to her, across this past year. Always courteous, friendly and professional earlier on in the year, keeping us well informed and recognising the burdens it had caused our family to be away from loved ones sadly left to pass thankfully in your excellent care. This gratitude should not go un-thanked or unacknowledged. You also recently were brought into a patient case you were initially not assigned to as complications had arisen, and I am happy to report that in this case, you expanded our family, and made me a grandmother. They do not like us to write comments that mention doctors by name, but you are very pretty.  You will make a wonderful senior consultant one day, and hopefully in Peterborough, my granddaughter may need you. Thank you for all you and alk your colleagues do to. I should also add, I was also a patient whilst my father was taken in earlier in the year, but I recovered quickly, so can also comment personally on the excellent care provided. There is a question about same-sex accomodation in the follow up - I am not sure how to answer this. I was not aware of this, I think this is for the staff that have had to work through the nights over the pandemic? I am not sure!!

readBy.name: North West Anglia NHS Foundation Trust

title: Great Practice
body: Had a smooth treatment when I went there. I was called by the Doctor immediately I arrived there and that was awesome!

title: very efficient
body: we went to Whitley House for our Covid vaccines and were very impressed by the whole system in place. everyone was polite, friendly and helpful. Thank you ðŸ˜Š

title: Very efficient
body: I went to Haresfield House for my vaccine in Jan 2021, the staff were great, everyone waited their turn and the atmosphere was almost jolly, came out after my vaccine in awe of their way of dealing with so many people!

title: Something unexpected but something great!
body:
My annual med review. Over the phone, not with my GP, not even with a doctor trainee. Needless to say, I had very low expectations. 

Firstly, I got an apology for running late and he asked whether it was still convenient to speak. As the call went on, I could tell he had clearly taken the time to look through my notes as he knew my current meds and main issues. The review felt very broad and open, we both laughed several times on the call, and by the end I realised I had spoken candidly about my mood, diet, exercise and with it felt comfortable to give true alcohol, blood pressure, weight and   exercise stats. 

Instead of the usual disapproving speech about my lifestyle, I found that he really listened to my situation and gave me realistic goals for someone of my weight, confidence and social anxiety â€“ he called me out on my list of excuses too. I havenâ€™t had CBT in over a year, and it felt like I had one of those one on one breakthrough sessions. An actual worthwhile med review with the pharmacist. If you get to read this, I have signed up for the voluntary thing that used to make me feel better about myself! Thank you!

title: Very professional and reassuring practice.
body: I can't thank the doctor and nurses enough for their professionalism and concern. The doctor was very reassuring and immediately put in place the appropriate tests, which were administered really quickly. I felt I was in safe hands. Thank you.

readBy.name: Royal United Hospital Bath NHS Trust

title: Great Team
body: I am so thankful for the prompt, friendly and expert treatment I have received - they have put my mind at rest and I know I am in safe hands.

title: Properly helpful
body: Going through a bit of a crisis with my mental health and the doctor phoned me as his first call of the day even though my appointment wasnâ€™t until 3 because he read notes that I had been having issues the night before too. Really helpful, knowledgeable doctor

title: Brilliant
body: Just had my first coronavirus vaccination at Whitley House.   It could not have been better organised.   The timing system meant it took place really quickly, the staff were so friendly, and clear, and I was given all the information I needed at the surgery, and to take away with me.  Thank you.

title: Absolutely fantastic service
body: Felt compelled to leave a review following the excellent  service my family and I received. My daughter is autistic and terrified of needles. With regards the covid jab not only were the staff fantastic in enabling her to have the jab with her dad but they kept her very calm. Thank you so much for this especially considering how very busy you are. The vaccination process was so well organised and I was extremely impressed.

author: Silxh56
title: Well informed throughout colonoscopy
body:
Attended 30 minutes prior to appointment time. Was admitted immediately. Process carried out in a most professional and friendly manner. Kept well informed throughout.  
Cannot fault anything about my visit.

author: Jo64
title: Painless covid 19 vaccination
body: Iâ€™ve just received my first covid vaccination at south lakes leisure centre, Craigavon Northern Ireland. It all went very smoothly, no delays and really helpful staff. Everything was explained and the vaccination was painless. Canâ€™t wait to get the second one!

readBy.name: Southern Health and Social Care Trust

author: saturnbp47
title: Wonderful care and fantastic team for my colonoscopy
body:
I had a colonoscopy at Royal Cornwall Hospital today - investigation for possible bowel cancer. I was, as can be expected, very worried about the procedure and indeed delayed it once.  
The communication from the Hospital was great - reassuring me over the telephone that all would be well. I hate being late so arrived 1/2 hr early - was greeted by a fantastic lady at the colonoscopy department - who was kind, reassuring and actually made me laugh as she was also trying to juggle rotas whilst managing patients.  
I was then greeted by a fantastic pre-procedure nurse - Zoe - who took me through the paperwork and gave me the gown and "shorts of dignity". She was so kind, reassuring and could not have put my mind at rest any more if she tried.  
A brief wait and through to the room where I was greeted by the consultant Maia and her wonderful team - and great 80's music playing. Again great care shown for my obvious anxiety - and even held my hand whilst part of the procedure got very uncomfortable.  
Post procedure - very reassuring from Maia and the other 2 lovely nurses (forgive me I cannot record their names - sorry - Anna?).  
On to recovery and Zoe was there again - great care - a cup of juice and a lovely chat. Not felt hurried in any way - just pure care. Zoe then called my wife, made me a coffee and walked me down to my wife at the car park.  
I was absolutely dreading today - but the whole team - from Booking Office, Reception and all the fantastic clinical staff cannot be praised enough. I am so grateful that today is behind me - but made so much more comfortable by a wonderful team.  
Thank you - you all deserve a 100% pay rise.

author: rkjacks
title: My 1st Covid vaccine
body: It was a very professional and happy experience, everyone was so kind reassuring.

author: Kelly Larmour
title: Flawless COVID vaccination 1 & 2
body:
Received both COVID Vaccines at the Royal Victoria Hospital with the Belfast Health & Social Care Trust, Northern Ireland.  
The care I received was high quality and person-centred. Staff were extremely professional and the service provided was flawless.

readBy.name: Belfast Health and Social Care Trust

author: DGB57
title: Respect and efficiency at my covid vaccination
body:
I attended the Ulster Hospital this morning for my first covid-19 vaccination. From arriving at the well-signposted car park to leaving after receiving the vaccination, I was treated with great respect and efficiency.  
All staff, car parking, administration and nursing were excellent. Thank you.

readBy.name: South Eastern Health and Social Care Trust

author: JPeanuts
title: Incredible care for the birth of our daughter
body:
Our daughter was born in the Borders General Hospital in mid-March this year, and our experience was just incredible from start to finish.  
Our positive story has a lot to do with how well we were guided by the staff at the BGH. We had telephone conversations before going into the hospital which helped my wife understand her stages of labour. Once we were in the hospital, Melissa and Fiona already had the pool filling up and everything from that point was extremely caring and professional.  
Iâ€™m particularly glad and grateful to Melissa and Fiona for guiding my wifeâ€™s labour whilst allowing her all the space she needed. The midwife team were so responsive to my wife and daughterâ€™s needs but encouraged us to allow things to take their natural course; something my wife was particularly focused on.  
4 hours in the pool and our daughter comes into the world. Best day ever. Donâ€™t tell my son. Thanks NHS and thanks BGH for your incredible commitment.

title: Well organised
body: My wife and me had our covid vaccines here, the organisation was excellent as was the young lady who administered our vaccines. Have used the practice a few times since joining and always come away very satisfied and assured

title: Covid-19 Vaccination
body: Received the vaccine today - excellent service from start to finish. The friendly staff and volunteers, high levels of hygiene and organisation made for a stress free experience.

title: Great practice
body:
Had my first COVID-19 vaccination yesterday (19/03/21).
Just want to thank staff and volunteers there as the whole process was safe, quick and easy.
Well done all !

title: Fabulous service, superbly organised andâ€¦
body: Just wanted to take a few moments to thank all of the staff at the Harborough Medical Centre for their care when I received my first Coronavirus jab yesterday.  The staff were very organised, friendly, personable and more importantly - for somebody not a massive fan of needles - didn't even notice the injection.  Not even a mark or any swelling afterwards.  Thank you to you all - you are doing an amazing job.

title: Absolutely diabolical wish I had other options
body: Been left in pain and fobbed off by reception staff for the past 2 weeks. Nothing gets explained to you just constantly rejected by reception staff. Told to bring in sample by doctor, take it in told at reception has to be before a certain time so canâ€™t accept it. Another waisted trip/time/experience at this place. Medical staff are good, friendly and helpful when you finally get through the reception barrier

title: Covid vaccination @ Cathedral
body: My experience was wonderful- accompanied by 'and did those feet in ancient times' my feet in modern times were truly moved! Super, efficient, uplifting THANK YOU

title: Rude staff
body:
Impossible to get through on the phone. Never able to get appointments. You're looking at months to get any medical history.
Been trying to get through (calling daily) for the past week and was finally able to do so today. Asked for a medical checkup for work which I need before 19th April and was told there is a 12 month waiting list.
Staff are rude and unhelpful. Told today by a staff member that I had no common sense as I should have registered at another practice for this to be done. I spent the following evening contemplating my own worth and this isnâ€™t the first time Iâ€™ve been put down or shamed by a member of their staff.
Always having to go without my medication as they are unable to get my repeat prescription right.
Just a complete shambles.

title: Great Service
body: Had an appointment arranged for a Covid Jab. Went in at the arranged time. The nurse explained the progress and completed the jab. It was a very quick and easy process in having the vaccine.

title: Great practice
body: I attended the minister ward for a cataract operation the staff were absolutely amazing nothing was a problem for them, also I would like to mention the operating theatre staff totally put you at ease can not fault the experience

readBy.name: Sherwood Forest Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust

title: Great pratice
body: Thank you to all your team a I know that you are all working really hard to keep us safe. Vaccine at the cathedral was very smooth and well organised so thanks to them all so , many thanks Chris.

title: Great COVID vaccination service
body: Booked through Arden Medical but delivered by Balsall Common Clinic, service was excellent from start to finish, great welcome at the car park and entrance, everything explained clearly and vaccination delivered with no fuss, thanks to all those concerned volunteers and staff alike

title: Covid Vaccine
body: What a great organised service you are running here. From booking the vaccine to having it. Very efficient and organised, very impressive from the volunteers to the practice staff. Well done, I canâ€™t recommend highly enough . Thank you .

title: Great practice
body: Had my covid jab today , very lovely and friendly staff all through the process and very caring to everyone that goes to have their vaccination . 100% to all staff involved with their friendly approach to the public .

title: Really efficient
body: The way the practice has supported management of Covid vaccination notification, booking and delivery, has been excellent. Iâ€™m extremely grateful to everyone involved

title: Best vaccination centre in the World
body: Visited the Cathedral today for my first Covid-19 vaccination. Entry via the masonry workshops allowed a sneak peak at the ongoing refurbishments. Socially distanced, safe, very welcoming and friendly venue with epic views and so much history. Checked in speedily and without a hitch. Very short wait to be seen and after a few questions I was heading for the door again. All the journey was accompanied by relaxing organ music. It felt like a lovely day out and mini tour of a wonderful historic landmark.

title: Absolutely ridiculous
body: Can never get through to reception to get appointments!!! I am 34 and never ring the doctors for appointments I always find things off so now today when I do I canâ€™t get one plus I started out being caller number 24 haha joke

title: Vaccine chaos
body:
Went to st Lukeâ€™s today to get my Covid vaccine . I was booked in for 10-30 . I arrived at 10-20 and I kid you not there were probably 100 people in the line in front of me !
Iâ€™ve heard other people talking about  how well organised other vaccine centres are but  st Lukeâ€™s are a  joke.
I am working and havenâ€™t got time to wait around in a line that long. I thought the idea of a time slot was precisely that!
Iâ€™m sure st Lukeâ€™s will have an excuse of why theyâ€™re disorganised and how I should be grateful they exist and I am grateful they exist but they should be better .
If they were a company that wasnâ€™t funded by the government they would fail .

title: Great practice
body:
I find the surgery most helpful and professional and I would thoroughly recommend the oaks to anyone who was thinking of joining.
Iâ€™ve just had my Covid jab too and the surgery was friendly supportive and well organised

title: Brilliant team at this surgery.
body: A big thank you to all the team and volunteers at the surgery during the vaccination programme in particular. I am needle phobic and everyone was very supportive to me. So thank you all.  Wendy Bunting.

title: Good practice
body: Friendly staff and very helpful , went in for my COVID vaccination and was fast efficient and professional.

title: 5 Star!
body: I visited for my COVID vaccination & was so impressed by how well organised it was. Everyone was so friendly & professional (and Iâ€™m a nervous patient!). There was a small queue outside but I was seen really quickly. Thank you to everyone involved!

title: Covid Vaccinations
body: Had my Covid Jab this morning 20/03/2021 and I have to say the staff, doctors and wardens were amazing, it was so well run I was in and out within about 10 minutes. Amazing service and thankyou all for all your hard work.

title: Very well run
body: COVID vaccination process very well run & efficient. Was in and out in less than 10 minutes despite being early for appointment

title: Great Covid Jab experience
body: My husband and I were delighted to have our Covid Jab this Saturday morning at Whitley House Surgery...just wanted to say huge 'well done & thank you' to all the staff and volunteers, it was amazingly easy....fantastically well organised from parking to exiting; no waiting involved; everyone was so welcoming; great experience and heartening to see everyone pulling together during these challenging times.....plus we honestly didn't feel a thing!  Great job Whitley House as always!!

title: Day care unit
body: I spent a few hours here today  19/03/20201, having a minor operation. The care I received from all the staff was amazing. The nurses were lovely and the after care was spot on.  Could not do enough to help and support me in my recovery.  Very impressed and thankful; wonderful staff.

readBy.name: James Paget University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust

title: Covid vaccination
body:
Very impressed with the efficiency and friendly nature of the staff. 
Organised so well and was seen before my appointment time. Thank you to everyone involved!

title: First COVID-19 vaccination
body: Very smooth quick and efficient process in the lovely surroundings of Salisbury Cathedral - very well organised

title: Vaccination quick and easy
body: Helpful communication and quick process. Very happy with it all. Why does this survey need a 100 character response?

title: Efficient and friendly service
body:
Very pleased with how the vaccination centre was set up.  Very well manned and organised.  Staff were very friendly, efficient and empathetic. 
Thanks you for making it easy and stress free.

title: Excellent service
body: Very professional.  Quick experience. Good stuff nhs. Looks like I need 100 characters. Blimey,, ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ˜‰ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘

title: COVID Vaccine
body: Very well organised, staff extremely caring and kind. As I have an allergy, they seemed to be extra cautious. Very happy with the service

title: Coronavirus vaccination.
body:
I attended the surgery today to have my vaccination. It was very well organised, did not have to wait was seen straight away. The person giving me the vaccination was very nice and knowledgeable and answered all my questions.
Very impressed.

title: Covid-19 Vaccination Centre
body: Excellent, efficient, friendly staff. Went through as smooth as silk. Well done all working there, you are all doing a great job, especially the nurse that gave me my vaccine! ðŸ‘

title: Covid vaccination
body: In and out very quickly, no queuing.  Vaccination was painless and everyone was very friendly. Thank you.

title: Covid Jab
body: Lots of easy parking, lots of covid marshals, easy to navigate around.  I was in and out in 5 minutes.  I got a bit fractious as I am hard of hearing in one ear and many mask wearers mumble. Two started speaking at once and I then felt a bit pulled hither and thither! But glad I went along.

title: Covid vaccine
body: Had a very positive experience - the operation was very efficiently run and the staff were very helpful and friendly

title: Amazing Vaccine Programme
body: I went today to get my covid vaccination, it was a wonderful experience, so professional and really made me feel safe. Everyone was wonderful, especially the doctor I saw.

title: Brilliant
body: What a brilliant surgery with a fantastic team! Kind and caring staff in a well organised practice. Well done!

title: COVID vaccination
body: Vaccinated at Cathedral. Excellent organisation, very quick service. Easily booked through link sent by surgery.

title: Professional, informative and friendly service
body: I attended the centre recently for my first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine. As an individual working in education, it couldnâ€™t have come soon enough! The service was swift and well organised. The doctors were extremely helpful in sharing important safety information before they administered the dose. They made everyone feel comfortable and delivered the service safely and with professionalism. They were super! Thank you to everyone involved, you really are heroes.

title: Excellent vaccination service!
body: I attended the surgery for my Covid-19 jab today and was extremely impressed by the quality of the service and the kindness of all involved. The volunteers are amazing for their cheerfulness and dedication and the staff were wonderful and reassuring. The process took about 10 minutes from the start of the queue to leaving (leaflet in hand). I am just one of 1200 people attending today - and one of many voices here appreciating your hard work. Thanks you!

title: Excellent service
body: Was given the opportunity to go for a Covid Vaccination yesterday. The staff and administering Doctor, Dr Grey, were extremely personable and very helpful with all questions I had. Thank you for such a nice and pleasant experience.

title: Vaccine
body: I had my COVID vaccine today, the service was amazing. Well done everyone. I was in and out in no time at all.

title: Well managed
body:
Well managed covid vaccination session at the surgery 
All the staff were very professional and polite

title: Covid Vaccine
body:
Easy to make an appointment. No real wait on arrival- made to feel welcome. Well organised, easy to check in. Vaccine explained, questions answered. Next appointment was already made for you.
Easy.

title: Covid-19 vaccination centre
body: I had my vaccination 20/3/21 and must say I was so impressed with the well organised system at the surgery. It all ran very smoothly and the volunteers were extremely polite and helpful. I was in and out in no time. Thank you all for making this possible.

title: Fantastic Vaccine Services
body: Really positive experience from start to finish.  Massive thanks to the volunteers and staff who are doing an amazing job for our local community!

title: Incredibly polite and efficient
body: Amazing organisation and a great team of people from start to finish. The whole visit took a matter of minutes - and Iâ€™m extremely appreciative of everyoneâ€™s efforts. Many thanks.

title: Covid injection
body: Brilliantly organised. Staff were excellent. Every thing was explained and no waiting around. I can not recommend the staff highly enough. Great service.

title: Great Practice
body:
I've never had anything but great service from this GP in 30 years and my recent covid jab was no different.  Simple, slick, operation with lots of volunteers and a painless process.
Thank you and keep up the good work.

title: COVID-19 Vaccination Centre
body:
Superb system in place from parking to having the jab and getting back to the car again. 

Friendly, efficient what a well run process from start to finish.

body:

body:

The jabs were administered carefully and painlessly and the whole process was completed in a matter of minutes.  We were both happy to have done our bit to support the vaccine rollout!

title: Great members of staff  kids department
body: Miss mahammered treated my daughter since 2017 filling a new tooth and root canal on front tooth ,she knocked out .Excellent treatment and explaining to my daughter who now is 13 yrs to make her feel not worried and upset .All the team were brilliant now our treatment over and teeth look great ðŸ‘ thank you team .

title: Brilliantly Run Vaccine Centre
body: Very efficient, brilliant volunteers, expertly run. Thought the vaccine process would of been an ordeal, how wrong was I, very impressed. Thank you

title: Outstanding!
body: After having my first vaccination today at the surgery, I wanted to leave a review of what a well organised and efficient service I experienced. The staff and volunteers were amazing working tirelessly to provide a great service with happy smiling faces and the procedures and systems in place were well organised and efficient. I was very moved by the tireless care and dedication to provide this service despite vaccinating up to 800 people a day. Well done and thank you to you all for helping in the fight against this disease.

title: Outstanding care
body: I went to have my Covid vaccination today and just wanted say how well organised and lovely the whole experience was. I was quite anxious and all the staff and volunteers were lovely. Thank you for being so supportive.

title: Excellent care
body: Initially I would have liked to give a 'call out' to several exceptional members of staff but as I'm not allowed to mention names or gender I'll just say the treatment I received on Ward 8 recently was fabulous. Thank you to clinical and nursing staff for your care and attention, it's much appreciated. ðŸ˜˜

title: Great practice
body:

Well Done and Thank You to everyone involved in the organising .ðŸ’–

title: Chester racecourse vaccination centre
body: Thank you so much. Amazing organisation. Lovely staff. Friendly, helpful and all smiley! From the car park attendants to the actual vaccination staff. You are all just brilliant! ðŸ˜ðŸ‘

title: COVID Vacination
body: Excellent experience - arrived 10 minutes early, taken in immediately. Very friendly and re-assuring and I didn't feel a thing!

title: Great practice
body: The whole experience was a pleasure. Dealt with very quickly and efficiently. Doctor was very friendly and calming.

title: Amazing Practice
body: My experience at this practice was efficient, speedy and all the staff were really helpful and friendly. Definitely recommend this practice.

title: SUPERB COVID Vaccine Centre
body: Such a pleasant experience at the surgery for my COViD vaccine. Extremely well run with friendly, knowledgeable staff and volunteers. I felt safe and really well looked after. The whole thing lasted less than 5 mins. Well done to all involved in making this a such a smooth process and positive experience.

title: Quick & easy vaccination
body: I attended Salisbury Cathedral for my COVID vaccine. There was a small queue and I got checked in quickly and then in to the booth to have my vaccination. A very slick process. Thank you.
